title: Saved worlds have a <state> tag which mess up world reset

content.raw:
How to reproduce:

1. Open Gazebo
1. Insert a box
1. Translate the box into a new position
1. Save the world
1. Close Gazebo
1. Open the saved world - the box will be in the new position
1. Reset the world - the box goes back to the position where it was inserted for the first time

I believe the user's intention when saving the world is to set the current world state as the initial state.


Also see this [question](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/16144/world-shifts-after-reset/).
